products.labels: Halal, Green Dot, Punto Verde, Vegetariano
products.facts: ["375 g is often used as a standard measurement for various materials in cooking and baking.","Materials weighing 375 g can vary widely, from food items to packaging materials.","The ecological impact of a 375 g item depends on its material, with some being recyclable and others contributing to waste.","Quality assessments of 375 g items typically consider durability, effectiveness, and sustainability of the materials used."]

products.name: Chips Ahoy Original
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Chocolate biscuits
products.facts: ["Chips Ahoy Original cookies are made with real chocolate chips.","The packaging is recyclable, contributing to reduced waste.","Chips Ahoy cookies contain no artificial flavors or preservatives.","The product is made with high-quality ingredients to ensure a consistent taste and texture."]

products.name: Sunflower & Pumpkin Loaf
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads
products.facts: ["Made with whole grain flour, sunflower seeds, and pumpkin seeds for a nutritious boost.","Sunflower and pumpkin seeds are rich in healthy fats, protein, and essential vitamins.","The ingredients can be sourced from sustainable farms, promoting ecological balance.","This loaf is often free from artificial preservatives and additives, ensuring high quality and natural flavor."]

products.name: Coca-Cola Zero
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Sodas, Colas, en:diet-cola-soft-drink
products.facts: ["Coca-Cola Zero is packaged in a 330 ml aluminum can, which is 100% recyclable.","The production process for Coca-Cola Zero aims to reduce water usage and energy consumption.","Coca-Cola Zero uses artificial sweeteners like aspartame and acesulfame potassium to provide a zero-calorie beverage.","The brand is committed to sustainability, with initiatives to reduce carbon emissions and promote recycling programs."]

products.name: Mixed nut
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages,Plant-based foods,Legumes and their products,Spreads,Nuts and their products,Plant-based spreads,Oilseed purees,Legume butters,Nut butters,Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Mixed nuts typically contain a variety of nuts such as almonds, cashews, walnuts, and hazelnuts, providing a diverse range of nutrients.","The packaging of mixed nuts often uses recyclable materials, promoting eco-friendliness and reducing waste.","High-quality mixed nuts are usually roasted without added oils or preservatives, ensuring a healthier snack option.","Many mixed nut brands source their nuts from sustainable farms, supporting ecological balance and responsible farming practices."]

products.name: Prime Hydration Drink - Blue Raspberry
products.facts: ["Contains electrolytes for hydration and recovery.","Packaged in a recyclable 500 mL bottle.","Free from artificial flavors and colors.","Low in calories and sugar, promoting a healthier choice."]

products.name: Hipro
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Desserts, Fermented milk products, Dairy desserts, Fermented dairy desserts, Yogurts
products.facts: ["Hipro products are made from 100% recycled materials.","The production process of Hipro minimizes water usage and energy consumption.","Hipro is certified by multiple ecological standards, ensuring sustainability.","All Hipro products undergo rigorous quality testing to ensure durability and performance."]

products.name: Oreo Double Stuff
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits
products.facts: ["Oreo Double Stuff cookies contain a cream filling that is made with sugar, palm and/or canola oil, and high fructose corn syrup.","The packaging of Oreo Double Stuff is recyclable in many areas, contributing to reduced waste.","Oreo cookies are produced in a facility that adheres to quality control standards to ensure consistency in taste and texture.","The brand has made commitments to source sustainable palm oil and reduce its environmental impact in cookie production."]

products.name: Organic White Bread Done Right
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Breads, White breads
products.labels: Organic, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["Made with 100% organic ingredients, free from synthetic pesticides and fertilizers.","Baked using sustainable practices that minimize environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives, colors, or flavors, ensuring high-quality nutrition.","Packaged in eco-friendly materials to reduce plastic waste and promote recycling."]

products.name: Biscoff
products.categories: Snacks, Sweet snacks, Biscuits and cakes, Biscuits, Shortbread cookies
products.facts: ["Biscoff cookies are made with natural ingredients including wheat flour, sugar, and vegetable oils.","The packaging for Biscoff is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal practices.","Biscoff cookies are free from artificial colors and preservatives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","The brand is committed to sustainable sourcing of palm oil used in their products, minimizing environmental impact."]

products.name: Salad Cream
products.ingredients_text: Water, Spirit Vinegar, Rapeseed Oil (22%), Sugar, Mustard Powder, Modified Cornflour, Pasteurised Egg Yolks (3%), Salt, Colour (Riboflavin).
products.facts: ["Salad Cream is primarily made from a blend of water, vinegar, and vegetable oils.","The packaging for Salad Cream is often recyclable, promoting better waste management.","Many Salad Cream brands focus on using free-range eggs in their recipes to ensure higher quality and ethical sourcing.","Some Salad Cream products are made without artificial preservatives, enhancing their quality and natural appeal."]
